data.title: Closing Final Defence Submission in Qarase Case - 1
data.meta_description: Closing Final Defence Submission in Qarase Case_1 - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document contains the closing submissions for the defence in the criminal case of Fiji v Laisenia Qarase. It argues that Mr. Qarase is being unfairly prosecuted for minor administrative oversight, rather than genuine corruption. Specifically, it claims that Mr. Qarase did not conceal or profit from his involvement in helping three companies obtain shares in Fijian Holdings Limited, and that the maximum penalty for failing to declare an interest is a $1000 fine, rather than the abuse of office charges carrying 3 years imprisonment that have been brought against him. It urges the assessors to consider the case in perspective and determine whether Mr. Qarase's actions truly amounted to corruption and abuse of his position, or
